channel.title: CVE Feed for HelpDezk -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HelpDezk -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3037|2024-08-02T06:41:04.086Z -- helpdezk -- helpdezk%20community
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in HelpDezk Community affecting version 1.1.10. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to access the platform without authentication and retrieve personal data via the jsonGrid parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-3038|2024-08-02T06:41:04.148Z -- helpdezk -- helpdezk%20community
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in HelpDezk Community affecting version 1.1.10. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the rows parameter of the jsonGrid route and extract all the information stored in the application.
